commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basa2ec837"

diff:
"a2ec837 Actually use an escape for the nul character. bug 375639, r+a=brendan
diff --git a/js/src/jsopcode.c b/js/src/jsopcode.c
index c4cc774..7d99f61 100644
--- a/js/src/jsopcode.c
+++ b/js/src/jsopcode.c
@@ -516,7 +516,7 @@ const char js_EscapeMap[] = {
     '"',  '"',
     '\'', '\'',
     '\\', '\\',
-    0
+    '\0', '0'
 };
 
 #define DONT_ESCAPE     0x10000
"
